title: Ticket #800: Win32 release ZIP file has fully-qualified pathnames
description: On Win32, the ZIP file created for release by /msconfig/dopackaging.bat stores the fully-qualified pathnames on the build machine into the zip file. How embarrassing. We should just include the pathnames we recurse into.
